Paragraph: We compared the effects of single doses of 50 mg atenolol ( cardioselective ) , 40 mg propranolol ( nonselective ) , and placebo on both exercise - and isoproterenol - induced tachycardia in two experiments involving nine normal subjects .

The two instances of "tachycardia" in the paragraph refer to the same disease entity. It is a condition characterized by an abnormally rapid heart rate, and it is mentioned as the outcome being studied in the experiments conducted in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

The entity "tachycardia" is the only disease mentioned in the paragraph. The other entities, "atenolol" and "propranolol", are medications used to treat various conditions, but they are not diseases themselves.
